definition: doing good is like a hard climb, doing evil is like an easy fall (idiom)

almost everything has a start, but not many things have an end (idiom); don't start sth you can't handle

definition: water that is too clear has no fish, and one who is too severe has no friends (idiom)

related.word: 水至清则无鱼，人至察则无徒

related.word: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆

sincere belief and diligent study
